procedure.title: PREPARATION OPERATION FOR REPAIRING THE SEALING
CHECK THE POSITION AND ADJUST IF NECESSARY:

procstep.para: The tire pressure for vehicles equipped with sunroof.
The sunroof mobile panel seal roof opening element seal : removal - refittingGIEMR-001347.
The sunroof mobile panel roof opening element mobile panel : removal - refittingGIEMR-001700.
The base of the radio aerial.
The roof / side roof rail mastic filling.

noteR.para: If the seals are dirty, clean them in soapy water vehicle : sealing checkGIEMR-002440.

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
YES: check the sealing of the zone roof : sealing checkGIEMR-001722.

procstep.para: Was water present in the passenger compartment of the vehicle?

ul.li: YES: move on to the next step.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE ROOF BARS

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after checking the sealing of the roof bars?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.
a) if the roof bar mountings are loosened, tighten the roof bar mountings roof bar : removal - refittingGIEMR-000237,
b) if the roof bar sealing plates are deformed or cracked, replace the roof bar plates roof bar : removal - refittingGIEMR-000237,
c) if the panelwork is deformed in the roof bar contact area, flatten the contact area then check the plates; replace the plates if necessary roof bar : removal - refittingGIEMR-000237.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the roof bars.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE SUNROOF MOBILE PANEL

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after checking the sealing of the sunroof mobile panel?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.

a) if the sunroof mobile panel is incorrectly positioned or poorly adjusted, adjust the clearances and flush fitting of the sunroof mobile panel roof opening element mobile panel : removal - refittingGIEMR-001700.
b) if the sunroof mobile panel seal is deformed, cracked or cut, replace the sunroof mobile panel seal roof opening element seal : removal - refittingGIEMR-001347.

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the sunroof mobile panel roof : sealing checkGIEMR-001722.

procedure.title: REPAIRING THE SEALING OF THE SUNROOF FIXED WINDOW OR FIXED GLASS ROOF WINDOW

procstep.para: Is water present in the passenger compartment after checking the sealing of the sunroof fixed window or fixed glass roof window?

ul.li: NO: move on to the next step.

a) if the mastic of the sunroof fixed window or fixed glass roof window is faulty, remove the sunroof fixed window or the fixed glass roof window roof opening element fixed window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002421, roof fixed window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002425, roof front section fixed window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002427, roof rear section fixed window : removal - refittingGIEMR-002426.,
re-apply the window bonding range window bonding : descriptionGIEMR-000562 (NT 0560A or Windows) or roof opening element bonding : descriptionGIEMR-000561 Â (NT 0560A or Windows)

procstep.para: Check the sealing of the sunroof fixed window or fixed glass roof windowroof : sealing checkGIEMR-001722
